titles.title: Indian Tribal Government Unemployment Compensation Act Amendments of 1995
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to treat for unemployment compensation purposes Indian tribal governments the same as State or local units of government or as nonprofit organizations.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 6/16/1995--Introduced. Indian Tribal Government Unemployment Compensation Act Amendments of 1995 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to treat employment by federally recognized tribal governments, for unemployment compensation tax purposes, in the same manner as employment by State or local units of government or nonprofit organizations.
